body:
https://github.com/LLNL/spack/commit/f24398cde6902ae7871d7bd1992a0e1a08c47ab0 added `libbsd` as a dependency of `expat`, which can't be built on macOS:

```
libbsd-0.8.6-y6pciy4czpfghl622mv2wu26achcbtxx/libbsd-0.8.6/include/bsd/libutil.h:42:10: fatal error: 'features.h' file not found
#include <features.h>
         ^
```
title: expat and consequently graphviz are broken on macOS
